config.script:
logger = system.util.getLogger('updateDTReason')
	queryPath = 'app/DT/upsertEventDowntimeReason'
	reasonID = self.view.custom.Reason
	sequence = 0
	userName = self.session.custom.UserName
	notes = self.view.custom.SelectedNotes
	stateEventID = self.view.params.RowData.EventID
	stateEventSubID = -1
	stateEventFinalID = reasonID
	
	if self.parent.getChild("SubReason/Dropdown").props.enabled:
		stateEventSubID = self.view.custom.SubReason
		stateEventFinalID = stateEventSubID
	
	
	params = {
		'stateEventID': stateEventID,
		'reasonID': stateEventFinalID,
		'sequence': 0,
		'userName': userName,
		'notes': notes
	}
		
	system.perspective.print(params)	
	try:
		system.db.runNamedQuery(queryPath, params)
		system.perspective.sendMessage('changeDTEvent')
	except:
		gpa.frontEnd.localUI.throwError('There was an error with updating table')
	else:	
		system.perspective.closePopup('downtimePopup')
		gpa.frontEnd.localUI.throwSuccess('Updated event')

DisabledPopup.message: Please sign in as quarterback to proceed.
DisabledPopup.title: Invalid Permissions

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	import time
	time.sleep(0.1)
	self.view.refreshBinding('custom.SubReasons')
	self.view.refreshBinding('custom.SubReason')
